definition: water caltrop or water chestnut (genus Trapa)
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Round Your Rough Edges. Than You Will Not Bump Against Others.
sentences.chinese: 先把自己的菱角磨圆就不会处处碰到别人的尖角。

sentences.english: Another uniquely southern addition to the Mid-Autumn Festival is the strangely shaped water caltrop.
sentences.chinese: 另一种南方独有的中秋美食就是形状古怪的菱角。

sentences.english: Your mother made you peel water chestnuts and snow peas.
sentences.chinese: 你老娘喜欢给你准备剥好的菱角和雪豆。

sentences.english: Objective To extract the crude polysaccharides from water-caltrop and to study their antitumor effect in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的分离提取菱角粗多糖并进行体外抑瘤作用研究。

sentences.english: The water chestnut floated placidly there, where it would grow.
sentences.chinese: 那棵菱角就又安安稳稳浮在水面上生长去了。

definition: Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 芡實|芡实[qian4 shi2]
Chinese water chestnut/Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta
mussels/bivalves grown in rivers and lakes
Manchurian wild rice 菰[gu1], aka water bamboo, or its edible stem, which resembles a bamboo shoot
